2  * playback_joint_states.cpp
3  * This implements playback from moveit model robot to real robot joint values
4  * Created on: 2015-06-15
5  * Author: Vinicius (vncprado@gmail.com)
6  */

20 #define SSC_BAUDRATE 115200
21 
22 double mapJointStates2pumpkin(YAML::Node servo,
23  boost::shared_ptr<const urdf::Joint>::element_type* joint,
24  std::vector<double> positions, int positions_i) {
25 
26  double in_min = joint->limits->lower;
27  double in_max = joint->limits->upper;
28  double out_min = servo["ssc"]["pulse_min"].as<uint16_t>();
29  double out_max = servo["ssc"]["pulse_max"].as<uint16_t>();
30  int pin = servo["ssc"]["pin"].as<int>();
31 
32  if (pin > positions.size())
33  return 0;
34  if ((in_max - in_min) == 0)
35  return 0;
36  double pos = (double) ((positions[positions_i] - in_min)
37  * (out_max - out_min) / (in_max - in_min) + out_min);
38 
39 // ROS_INFO("%s", joint->name.c_str());
40 // ROS_INFO("%f %f %f %f %d", in_min, in_max, out_min, out_max, pin);
41 // ROS_INFO("%f", pos);
42  if (pos > out_max)
43  return out_max;
44  if (pos < out_min)
45  return out_min;
46  else
47  return pos;
48  return 0;
49 }
50 
51 std::vector<YAML::Node> servos;
52 std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const urdf::Joint>::element_type*> joints;
53 std::vector<trajectory_msgs::JointTrajectoryPoint> points;
54 std::vector<std::string> joint_names;
55 std::string ssc_port;
56 double ros_rate;
57 
58 void fakeControllerJointStatesExecutionCallback(const sensor_msgs::JointStateConstPtr& ptr) {
59  ROS_INFO("Starting execution of planned path");
60 
61 // std::vector<double> positions = ptr.get()->position;
62 //
63 // for (int i=0; i<positions.size(); i++)
64 // printf(" --- fake_controller_joint_states event! %f ", positions[i]);
65 // printf("\n");
66 
67  ros::Rate loop_rate(ros_rate);
68  serial::Serial ssc(ssc_port, SSC_BAUDRATE,
69  serial::Timeout::simpleTimeout(1000));
70  for (int p = 0; p < points.size(); p++) {
71  if (!points.empty() && ros::ok()) {
72  std::vector<double> positions = points[p].positions;
73  std::ostringstream stringStream;
74  for (int i = 0; i < joints.size(); i++) {
75  // This find gets the correct position value of a joint in positions vector, based on joint_names
76  int positions_i = std::find(joint_names.begin(),
77  joint_names.end(), joints[i]->name.c_str())
78  - joint_names.begin();
79  if (positions_i >= positions.size()) {
80  continue;
81  }
82  uint16_t pulse = mapJointStates2pumpkin(servos[i], joints[i],
83  positions, positions_i);
84  stringStream << "#" << servos[i]["ssc"]["pin"] << " " << "P"
85  << pulse << " ";
86  }
87  stringStream << "\r";
88  ROS_INFO("%s", stringStream.str().c_str());
89 
90  ssc.write(stringStream.str()); // Send to ssc
91  loop_rate.sleep();
92  }
93  }
94 
95 // ssc.write(
96 // "#0 P0 #1 P0 #2 P0 #3 P0 #4 P0 #5 P0 #6 P0 #7 P0 #8 P0 #9 P0 #10 P0 #11 P0 #12 P0 #13 P0 #14 P0 #15 P0\r");
97 // ssc.write(
98 // "#16 P0 #17 P0 #18 P0 #19 P0 #20 P0 #21 P0 #22 P0 #23 P0 #24 P0 #25 P0 #26 P0 #27 P0 #28 P0 #29 P0 #30 P0 #31 P0 #31 P0\r");
99  ssc.close();
100 }

102 void plannedPathCallback(
103  const moveit_msgs::DisplayTrajectoryConstPtr& trajectories) {
104  ROS_INFO("Successfully get path planning");
105  moveit_msgs::RobotState trajectory_start = trajectories->trajectory_start;
106  moveit_msgs::RobotTrajectory trajectory = trajectories->trajectory[0];
107  points = trajectory.joint_trajectory.points;
108  joint_names = trajectory.joint_trajectory.joint_names;
109 
110 
111 }
112 
113 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
114  std::string input_config_calib, input_urdf, input_file;
115  if (argc >= 2) {
116  ssc_port = argv[1];
117  input_config_calib = argv[2];
118  input_urdf = argv[3];
119  } else {
120  printf(
121  "Usage: rosrun pumpkin playback_moveit <ssc_port> <input_config_calib> <input_urdf>\n");
122  ROS_ERROR("Failed to parse input files");
123  exit(-1);
124  }
125 
126  ros::init(argc, argv, "playback_moveit");
127  ros::NodeHandle nh;
128  ros::Subscriber planned_path = nh.subscribe(
129  "/move_group/display_planned_path", 1000, plannedPathCallback);
130  ros::Subscriber fake_controller_joint_states = nh.subscribe("/move_group/fake_controller_joint_states", 1000,
131  fakeControllerJointStatesExecutionCallback);
132  YAML::Node pumpkin_config = YAML::LoadFile(input_config_calib);
133  ros_rate = pumpkin_config["ros_rate"].as<double>()/10;
134  ROS_INFO("ros_rate %f", ros_rate);
135 
136  urdf::Model model;
137  if (!model.initFile(input_urdf)) {
138  ROS_ERROR("Failed to parse urdf file");
139  exit(-1);
140  }
141  ROS_INFO("Successfully parsed urdf file");
142 
143  typedef std::map<std::string, boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Joint> > UrdfJoints;
144  UrdfJoints::const_iterator joint_it = model.joints_.begin();
145  UrdfJoints::const_iterator joint_end = model.joints_.end();
146 
147  for (; joint_it != joint_end; ++joint_it) {
148  const boost::shared_ptr<const urdf::Joint>& urdf_joint =
149  joint_it->second;
150  if (urdf_joint->type == 1) { // all servo joints are revolute
151  if (urdf_joint->name[0] == 'r') {
152  std::string joint_name = urdf_joint->name;
153  servos.push_back(
154  pumpkin_config["right_arm"][joint_name.substr(
155  joint_name.find_first_of('_') + 1).c_str()]);
156  joints.push_back(urdf_joint.get());
157  }
158  if (urdf_joint->name[0] == 'l') {
159  std::string joint_name = urdf_joint->name;
160  servos.push_back(
161  pumpkin_config["left_arm"][joint_name.substr(
162  joint_name.find_first_of('_') + 1).c_str()]);
163  joints.push_back(urdf_joint.get());
164  }
165  }
166  }
167  ROS_INFO("Servos and joints");
168 
169  ros::spin();
170 
171  return 0;
172 }
